Symbol.Script_2D:
PEN gs_cont_pen FILL gs_fill_type
! === Circle & Circle with Backrest ===
if gs_SymbolType_m = 1 or gs_SymbolType_m = 2 or gs_SymbolType_m = 11 or gs_SymbolType_m = 12 then if gs_OrigoCentered then add2 -A/2,-A/2
if gs_symbolType_m = 1 or gs_symbolType_m = 2 or gs_symbolType_m = 11 then MSType = 4 endif
gosub "minimalSpaceChair"
add2 A/2,A/2
if gs_SymbolType_m = 2 then ! Circle with Backrest arc2 0,0,A/2+0.05,0,180 endif
if gs_SymbolType_m = 11 then ! Circle with Backrest 2 R = A/2+0.10 arc2 0,0,R,12,180-12 px1 = R * cos(12) py = R * sin(12) px2 = sqr((A/2)^2 - py^2) line2 px1,py, px2,py line2 -px1,py,-px2,py endif
if gs_SymbolType_m = 12 then ! Circle with Backrest 3 R = A/2+0.075
py1 = sqr((A/2)^2 - 0.019^2) py2 = sqr(R^2 - 0.019^2) for i=1 to 2 rot2 38 poly2_b 6, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,900, -0.019,py1,1, -0.019,py2,0, 0.019,py2,3001, 0.019,py1,0, -0.019,py1,3000 del 1 mul2 -1,1 next i del 2
poly2_b 9, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,901, R*cos(45), R*sin(45), 1, -R*cos(45), R*sin(45), 3001, -R*cos(45)-0.016*sin(45), R*sin(45)+0.016*cos(45), 1, -R*cos(45)-0.016*sin(45), R*sin(45)+0.016*cos(45)+0.044*sqr(2), 1001, R*cos(45)+0.016*sin(45), R*sin(45)+0.016*cos(45)+0.044*sqr(2), 3001, R*cos(45)+0.016*sin(45)-0.044*sin(45), R*sin(45)+0.016*cos(45)+0.044*cos(45), 901, R*cos(45)+0.016*sin(45), R*sin(45)+0.016*cos(45), 3001, R*cos(45), R*sin(45), 1 endif
poly2_b 2, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,901, A/2,360,4001
del 1 if gs_OrigoCentered then del 1
if not(gs_OrigoCentered) then gosub 1001 else gosub 1002 endif
gs_hotspotUnIdBegin = unID end gs_hotspotUnIdBegin endif
! === Rectangular chairs ===
IF gs_OrigoCentered THEN ADD2 -A/2,-B/2
if gs_SymbolType_m = 3 or gs_SymbolType_m = 4 or gs_SymbolType_m = 10 then !rectangle MSType = 4 endif if gs_SymbolType_m = 5 or gs_SymbolType_m = 6 then !trapezoid MSType = 4 endif if gs_SymbolType_m = 7 or gs_SymbolType_m = 8 then !curved MSType = 4 endif
gosub "minimalSpaceChair"
IF gs_SymbolType_m=0 GOSUB 1 ! Min. Space and Hotspots for detailed symbol IF gs_SymbolType_m=3 GOSUB 30 ! Rectangle IF gs_SymbolType_m=4 GOSUB 40 ! Rectangle with Backrest 1 IF gs_SymbolType_m=5 GOSUB 50 ! Trapezoid IF gs_SymbolType_m=6 GOSUB 60 ! Trapezoid with Backrest IF gs_SymbolType_m=7 GOSUB 70 ! Curved IF gs_SymbolType_m=8 GOSUB 80 ! Curved with Backrest IF gs_SymbolType_m=9 GOSUB 90 ! Rectangle with Backrest 2/ Office Chair IF gs_SymbolType_m=10 GOSUB 100 ! Rectangle with Backrest 3 IF gs_SymbolType_m=13 GOSUB 130 ! Curved with Backrest 2 IF gs_SymbolType_m=14 GOSUB 140 ! Curved with Backrest 3 IF gs_SymbolType_m=15 GOSUB 150 ! Detailed 1 IF gs_SymbolType_m=16 GOSUB 160 ! Detailed 2
IF gs_OrigoCentered THEN DEL 1
IF gs_OrigoCentered=0 THEN GOSUB 1003: ELSE GOSUB 1004: ENDIF
gs_hotspotUnIdBegin = unID end gs_hotspotUnIdBegin
! ============================================================================== ! Chair symbol types ! ==============================================================================
1:
! only minimal space for custom shaped chairs
RETURN
30:
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 5, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, A,0,1, A,b,1, 0,b,1, 0,0,-1
RETURN
40:
LINE2 0,b-0.05,a,b-0.05
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 5, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, A,0,1, A,b,1, 0,b,1, 0,0,-1
RETURN
50:
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 5, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, A,0,1, A-0.05,b,1, 0.05,b,1, 0,0,-1
RETURN
60:
x=(b-0.05)*0.05/b
LINE2 x,b-0.05,a-x,b-0.05
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 5, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, A,0,1, A-0.05,b,1, 0.05,b,1, 0,0,-1
RETURN
70:
R=A/2
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 6, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, A,0,1, A,B-R,1, A-R,B-R,901, R,180,4001, 0,0,-1
RETURN
80:
R=A/2
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 6, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, A,0,1, A,B-R,1, A-R,B-R,901, R,180,4001, 0,0,-1
tt=0.05 ARC2 A/2,B-R,A/2+tt,0,180
RETURN
90:
tt=0.075
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 5, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, A,0,1, A,b-tt*2,1, 0,b-tt*2,1, 0,0,-1
POLY2_B 5, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0+tt,B,1, A-tt,B,1, A-tt,b-tt,1, 0+tt,b-tt,1, 0+tt,B,-1
POLY2_B 5, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, A/2+tt/2,B-tt*2,1, A/2-tt/2,B-tt*2,1, A/2-tt/2,b-tt,1, A/2+tt/2,b-tt,1, A/2+tt/2,B-tt*2,-1
RETURN
100:
tt=b/6 dd=SQR((A/2)^2+tt^2) RAD=(dd*dd/2)/tt
ALFA=ABS(ATN((A/2+tt/2)/(RAD-2*tt)))
ARC2 A/2,B-RAD+tt+B/20,RAD,90-alfa,90+alfa
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 5, 1+2+64,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, A,0,1, A,b,1, 0,b,1, 0,0,-1
RETURN
130: armW = 0.15 R = A/2
fill gs_fill_type poly2_b 8, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, armW, 1, -armW, armW, 1, -armW, B-R, 1, A+armW,B-R, 1001, A+armW,armW, 1, A, armW, 1, A, B-R, 0, 0, B-R, 1000 poly2_b 9, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, A,0,1, A,B-R,1, A-R,B-R,901, R,90,4001, R,B-R,901, R,90,4001, 0,B-R,1, 0,0,-1
return
140: armW = 0.18 RR = 0.12 R = 0.55*A py1 = sqr(R^2 - (A/2)^2)
fill gs_fill_type poly2_b 9, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, A/2,B-R,901, 0, RR, 1, -armW, RR, 1, -armW, B-R+py1, 1, A+armW,B-R+py1, 3001, A+armW,RR, 1, A, RR, 1, A, B-R+py1, 0, 0, B-R+py1, 3000
poly2_b 9, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,RR,1, 0,-1,801, RR,0,1001, A-RR,0,1, A,RR,1001, A,B-R+py1,1, A/2,B-R,901, 0,B-R+py1,3001, 0,0,-1 line2 0,B-R+py1,A,B-R+py1 return
150: add2 A/2, 0 mul2 A, B/0.7589857878381 fill gs_fill_type
for i=1 to 2 poly2_b 8, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -0.412472310872, 0.5042872575346, 1, -0.4454789561129, 0.4891311203095, 900, 0, 130.4395594118, 4001, -0.4784237636223, 0.5044212080728, 1, -0.4783902044188, 0.4220186814645, 0, -0.4459418515027, 0.3223778518928, 900, 0, -36.6596484042, 4001, -0.4124802142925, 0.4216829844888, 1 poly2_b 10, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -0.4999896252663, 0.4121555143479, 1, -0.4999921861635, 0.1419262161206, 1, -0.4459430122221, 0.2317059334238, 900, 0, 62.09739999996, 4001, -0.3918940777391, 0.1419260719623, 1, -0.3501058248966, 0.1419260719623, 1, -0.3501058248966, 0.4121555426471, 1, -0.3918941247464, 0.4121555426471, 1, -0.4459418515027, 0.3223778518928, 900, 0, 62.09737000004, 4001 line2 -0.3918940777391, 0.1419260719623, -0.3918941247464, 0.4121555426471 mul2 -1,1 next i del 2
poly2_b 6, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -0.075054218316, 0.6691290901383, 1, -0.075054218316, 0.6255355490925, 0, 0.07507401621766, 0.6255355490925, 1, 0.07507401621766, 0.6691290901383, 0, 0, 2.159481211012, 900, 0, -5.766725549621, 4001 poly2_b 18, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -0.3501058248966, 0.06029010319873, 1, -0.3266482882507, 0.06029010319873, 900, 0, 77.1406285826, 4001, -0.3318689707315, 0.0374208990165, 1, 0.0001933890152809, 1.492023173939, 900, 0, 25.70384186485, 4001, 0.3318786602217, 0.03733486717531, 1, 0.3266639159237, 0.06020542614092, 900, 0, 77.15550547655, 4001, 0.3501214525696, 0.06020542614092, 1, 0.3501214525696, 0.6020780124466, 1, 0.3266639159237, 0.6020780124466, 900, 0, 90, 4001, 0.3266639159237, 0.6255355490925, 1, -0.3266482882507, 0.6255355490925, 1, -0.3266482882507, 0.6020780124466, 900, 0, 90, 4001, -0.3501058248966, 0.6020780124466, 1 poly2_b 18, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -0.3320516758034, 0.7046550439166, 1, 9.898950844489E-006, 2.159481211012, 900, 0, 25.71480945931, 4001, 0.332071473705, 0.7046550439166, 1, 0.3268515762168, 0.7275244272862, 900, 0, 77.14259527027, 4001, 0.3503091128627, 0.7275244272862, 1, 0.3503091128627, 0.7355282511922, 1, 0.3268515762168, 0.7355282511922, 900, 0, 90, 4001, 0.3268515762168, 0.7589857878381, 1, -0.3268317783152, 0.7589857878381, 1, -0.3268317783152, 0.7355282511922, 900, 0, 90, 4001, -0.350289314961, 0.7355282511922, 1, -0.350289314961, 0.7275244272862, 1, -0.3268317783151, 0.7275244272862, 900, 0, 77.14259527028, 4001 del 2 return
160: add2 A/2, 0 mul2 A, B/1.000573805672 fill gs_fill_type
for i=1 to 2 poly2_b 8, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -0.4913602514585, 0.5932312007, 1, -0.4999999870194, 0.2559180445856, 1, -0.4481481223429, 0.2734851839796, 900, 0, 135.2408619479, 4001, -0.3989599944684, 0.2494487879702, 1, -0.3730636287232, 0.5836196417518, 1, -0.4337282441606, 0.5697631364227, 900, 0, 144.9772801618, 4001 mul2 -1,1 next i del 2
poly2_b 34, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -0.4160154614959, 0.2173610833541, 1, -0.2426647168595, 0.2021957793166, 900, 0, 78.89103792634, 4001, -0.2909462953108, 0.03501516951152, 1, 0, 1.226266044023, 900, 0, 27.4499914213, 4001, 0.2909462970719, 0.03501515487816, 1, 0.2426644901561, 0.2021959511117, 900, 0, 78.89122141068, 4001, 0.4160154131803, 0.2173619985528, 1, 0.4150453351224, 0.2298798294306, 1, 0.4481489330328, 0.2734857626027, 900, 0, -26.75271134489, 4001, 0.3989600170767, 0.2494487879702, 1, 0.3730636513315, 0.5836196417518, 1, 0.4337282667687, 0.5697631364228, 900, 0, -23.78523116949, 4001, 0.3838047412901, 0.6069093328616, 1, 0.03834844775459, 0.565045281238, 900, 0, 19.30252764503, 4001, 0.3505469742921, 0.7187486630792, 1, 0, -0.2045072821347, 900, 0, 41.58209444127, 4001, -0.3505469516839, 0.7187486630792, 1, -0.0388052466752, 0.5641208553603, 900, 0, 19.25379281453, 4001, -0.3840993685039, 0.6073020896202, 1, -0.4337282441606, 0.5697631364227, 900, 0, -24.2373184648, 4001, -0.3730636287232, 0.5836196417518, 1, -0.3989599944684, 0.2494487879702, 1, -0.4481481223429, 0.2734851839796, 900, 0, -26.75316106862, 4001, -0.4150453099584, 0.2298798624104, 1 poly2_b 12, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0.3505469906775, 0.9778764755544, 1, 0, -1.717771323557, 900, 0, 14.81853820856, 4001, -0.3505469680693, 0.9778764755544, 1, -0.2745544832082, 0.848312574122, 900, 0, 119.2146181258, 4001, -0.3505469516839, 0.7187486630792, 1, 1.130413776809E-008, -0.2045072821347, 900, 0, -41.58209444127, 4001, 0.3505469742921, 0.7187486630792, 1, 0.2745545058164, 0.848312574122, 900, 0, 119.2146181258, 4001 del 2 return
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Hotspots !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
1001: unID = gs_hotspotUnIdBegin + 20 IF EditHotspots = 1 THEN
HOTSPOT2 A/2,0,unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2,A/2,unID: unID=unID+1
! Make Length stretchable
HOTSPOT2 0, A/2, unID, A, 1+256 unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -0.001, A/2, unID, A, 3+128 unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A, A/2, unID, A, 2 unID=unID+1
! Make Width stretchable
HOTSPOT2 A/2, 0, unID, A, 1+256 unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, -0.001, unID, A, 3+128 unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, A, unID, A, 2 unID=unID+1
ELSE
if NOT(bHideSingleHotspot) then HOTSPOT2 A/2,A,unID: unID=unID+1
ENDIF
RETURN
1002: unID = gs_hotspotUnIdBegin + 20 IF EditHotspots = 1 THEN
HOTSPOT2 0,-A/2,unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,0,unID : unID=unID+1
FOR k=1 to 4 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, temp_AA, 1+128, A: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, temp_AA, 3+128, A: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 temp_AA, 0, unID, temp_AA, 2, A: unID=unID+1 ROT2 90 NEXT k DEL 4 ELSE
if NOT(bHideSingleHotspot) then HOTSPOT2 A/2,A,unID: unID=unID+1
ENDIF
RETURN
1003: unID = gs_hotspotUnIdBegin + 20 IF EditHotspots = 1 THEN
HOTSPOT2 A/2,0,unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2,B/2,unID: unID=unID+1
CALL "Resize_A_B_ZZYZX" Parameters ALL GS_HotspotUnIDBegin = gs_hotspotUnIdBegin+20000
ELSE
if NOT(bHideSingleHotspot) then HOTSPOT2 A/2,B,unID: unID=unID+1
ENDIF
RETURN
1004: unID = gs_hotspotUnIdBegin + 20 IF EditHotspots = 1 THEN
HOTSPOT2 0,-B/2,unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,0,unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, -B/2, unID, temp_AA, 1+128, A: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, -B/2, unID, temp_AA, 3+128, A: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 temp_AA, -B/2, unID, temp_AA, 2, A: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, -B/2, unID, temp_AA, 1+128, A: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1, -B/2, unID, temp_AA, 3+128, A: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -temp_AA, -B/2, unID, temp_AA, 2, A: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, B/2, unID, temp_AA, 1+128, A: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, B/2, unID, temp_AA, 3+128, A: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 temp_AA, B/2, unID, temp_AA, 2, A: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, B/2, unID, temp_AA, 1+128, A: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1, B/2, unID, temp_AA, 3+128, A: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -temp_AA, B/2, unID, temp_AA, 2, A: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 -A/2, 0, unID, temp_BB, 1+128, B: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, -1, unID, temp_BB, 3+128, B: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, temp_BB, unID, temp_BB, 2, B: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 A/2, 0, unID, temp_BB, 1+128, B: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, -1, unID, temp_BB, 3+128, B: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, temp_BB, unID, temp_BB, 2, B: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 -A/2, 0, unID, temp_BB, 1+128, B: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, 1, unID, temp_BB, 3+128, B: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, -temp_BB, unID, temp_BB, 2, B: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 A/2, 0, unID, temp_BB, 1+128, B: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, 1, unID, temp_BB, 3+128, B: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, -temp_BB, unID, temp_BB, 2, B: unID=unID+1
ELSE
if NOT(bHideSingleHotspot) then HOTSPOT2 A/2,B,unID: unID=unID+1
ENDIF
RETURN
"minimalSpaceChair": if not(calledAsMacro) then DRAWINDEX 10 reqBMinSpace = 0 call "fa_minimalspace" parameters all MSType = MSType, unID = 3000, returned_parameters reqBMinSpace, MSFillType, MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, MSContLineType, MSContLinePen
if reqBMinSpace <> 0 and (MSFront > EPS or MSSide > EPS or MSRear > EPS)then FILL MSFillType PEN MSContLinePen line_type MSContLineType
if gs_symbolType_m = 1 or gs_symbolType_m = 2 or gs_symbolType_m = 11 then dim contours[5] contours[1] = (MSSide < EPS) contours[2] = (MSFront < EPS) contours[3] = (MSSide < EPS) contours[4] = ((MSRear < EPS) AND (B < A+EPS)) contours[5] = (MSSide < EPS) add2 A/2, A/2 for i = 1 to 4 POLY2_B 5, 1+2+4+64, MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, -A/2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 900, 0, 90, 4000+contours[i+1], -A/2, -A/2, contours[i], -A/2, 0, -1 rot2 90 next i del 5 if B > A + EPS then POLY2_B 5, 1+2+4+64, MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, 0, A, (MSSide < EPS), 0, B, (MSRear < EPS), A, B, (MSSide < EPS), A, A, 0, 0, A, -1 endif endif if gs_SymbolType_m = 5 or gs_SymbolType_m = 6 then if MSSide > EPS or MSRear > EPS then POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, 0, 0, (MSSide < EPS), 0, B, (MSRear < EPS), 0.05, B, 0, 0, 0, -1
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, A, 0, 0, A-0.05, B, (MSRear < EPS), A, B, (MSSide < EPS), A, 0, -1 endif endif if gs_SymbolType_m = 7 or gs_SymbolType_m = 8 then if MSSide > EPS or MSRear > EPS then add2 A/2, B-A/2 rot2 180 POLY2_B 5, 1+2+4+64, MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, -A/2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 900, 0, 90, 4000+(MSRear < EPS), -A/2, -A/2, (MSSide < EPS), -A/2, 0, -1 rot2 90 POLY2_B 5, 1+2+4+64, MSFillPen, MSFillBackPen, -A/2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 900, 0, 90, 4000+(MSSide < EPS), -A/2, -A/2, (MSRear < EPS), -A/2, 0, -1 del 3 endif endif endif PEN gs_cont_pen FILL gs_fill_type line_type 1 DRAWINDEX 30 endif return
Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS = 0.0001 !!!gs_SymbolType_Mask = 65535
dim idxSymbolTypes[16] idxSymbolTypes[ 1] = 1 idxSymbolTypes[ 2] = 2 idxSymbolTypes[ 3] = 11 idxSymbolTypes[ 4] = 12 idxSymbolTypes[ 5] = 3 idxSymbolTypes[ 6] = 4 idxSymbolTypes[ 7] = 9 idxSymbolTypes[ 8] = 10 idxSymbolTypes[ 9] = 5 idxSymbolTypes[10] = 6 idxSymbolTypes[11] = 7 idxSymbolTypes[12] = 8 idxSymbolTypes[13] = 13 idxSymbolTypes[14] = 14 idxSymbolTypes[15] = 15 idxSymbolTypes[16] = 16
dim stSymbolTypesArray[] dim iSymbolTypesArray[]
j = 1
for i=1 to vardim1(stSymbolTypes) if bittest(gs_SymbolType_Mask, i - 1) then idx = idxSymbolTypes[i] stSymbolTypesArray[j] = stSymbolTypes[idx] iSymbolTypesArray[j] = idx j = j + 1 endif next i
Symbol.Script_VL:
if vardim1(stSymbolTypesArray) > 0 then values "gs_SymbolType" stSymbolTypesArray values "gs_SymbolType_m" iSymbolTypesArray endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_SymbolType" then gs_SymbolType_m = 1 for i = 2 to vardim1(stSymbolTypes) if gs_SymbolType = stSymbolTypes[i] then gs_SymbolType_m = i i = vardim1(stSymbolTypes) ! break endif next i parameters gs_SymbolType_m = gs_SymbolType_m else if gs_SymbolType_m > 0 & gs_SymbolType_m <= vardim1(stSymbolTypes) then parameters gs_SymbolType = stSymbolTypes[gs_SymbolType_m] endif endif
if gs_OrigoCentered then if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "temp_AA" then parameters A=temp_AA*2 else parameters temp_AA=A/2 endif if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "temp_BB" then parameters B=temp_BB*2 else parameters temp_BB=B/2 endif endif
